title: 1800s Display Serif?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418204034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test_4410.jpg)

Hi All, anyone know what this could be? Thanks!
author: talgoretsky

comments.content: It’s a font called ‘PearlyGates’, but I don’t know where to (legally) get it from. At least, you know have a name to search with. Good luck!

It's also digitized and available as **[Cleaver's Juvenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418204034/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Cleaver%27s_Juvenia%20-%20Normal&fid=b17f41abb2aaf6615f504b65b773516e&fsize=60&text=MOND&fit=1)** free font by Paul Lloyd
